data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during BEAVER cruise from Madeira to Hampton Road started at 1758-01-22

Ship: Beaver (Sloop), Voyage: Madeira - Hampton Road Virginia, 1st Observer: Edward Gascoigne (Captain), 2nd Observer: Joseph Arrowsmith (2nd Officer/Lieutenant), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 18G 333BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
